Posts.Content: Hi. Chemo affects people differently, but I think most people do get really tired. It takes some getting used to, if you're used to being really active.  Be kind to yourself and take care.
Posts.Title: Day 7 Am I a softy?

Posts.Content: Hi milsam, I'm so glad you found a solution.  I haven't started hormone therapy yet, but I am having hot flushes and night sweats now and don't want this to get any worse. When the time comes, should it become really debilitating, I'll know what to try, so thanks a lot.  Silk night wear helps!
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen, hot flushes and night sweats and oxybutynin
